1.content: First of all, which genre are you looking for?
1.title: Which one?

11.content: Now which video are you looking for?
11.title: Video game shrink

choices: Explore the room and try not to get noticed...
114.content:
You have decided to stay in a travel lodge and rest for the night. You find one of the rooms that is free and step inside. "This will do" you say to yourself. All of a sudden you feel dizzy and fall to the floor and pass out.

Well you eventually wake up you notice everything in the room is huge! You judge your size to be about half an inch tall. Just then you hear foot steps. A gigantic female figure enters the room. You realise its Rikku one of the heroes that defeated Sin and saved Spira! She makes her way into the room. "Hmmm this ones free I guess..." she says as she closes the door behind her. Her giant boots begin to make their way towards you. You quickly run and hide under the bed. She walks over and sits down on the bed and takes her boots off. You see two enormous heals drop down infront of you. A slight odur comming from them....
114.title: Rikku(Final Fantasy)

1143.content: You catiously walk out from beneath the bed. Rikku's feet are unbeleivable in size now compared to you. You look up at Rikku, she seems to be reading something. You think you'll be able to climb under the door and escape. Just as you make it about half way across the room you hear loud movement behind you. You turn around and see Rikku has stood up and is walking around the room as if she is looking for something. You look around for somewhere to hide, theres one of Rikku's socks by the bed or theres a cup on the floor tipped on its side you could run into. THUMP THUMP! Rikku's left foot is hovering right on top of you...
1143.title: Explore the room and try not to get noticed...

choices: She takes you out of her sock...
She takes her sock of and doesn't notice you...
11431.content: You leap out of the way just as Rikku's giant foot hits the floor when you used to be. You pick yourself up and make a dash for the sock. Rikku is busy at the other side of the room so its easy to reach the sock. As soon as you enter the sock you notice a rather strong smell. Rikku must have done alot of walking today for her socks to smell like this. Suddenly... THUMP THUMP! You look around and one of Rikku's feet is right outside the sock. You are thrown of your feet and the sock violently moves all over the place. You notice Rikku's left foot is entering the sock you try to move but you can as the sock is still moving. Her big toe hits you and you fly to end of the sock, then all her toes fall ontop of you. You struggle to move. Her toes wiggle and you end up caught between her big and second biggest toes. Rikku walks around the room with you in her sock. Her feet start to warm. They already smell but now they are beggining to sweat. Eventually everything stops moving. She wiggles her toes a few more times and you end up under her toes again....
11431.title: Run for the sock!

choices: Rikku doesn't take kindly to your humor
114311.content:
Rikku stops moving. She lifts her toes, then taps them all down on you, as if doing the wave with her feet. She does it once, twice, three times, then stops. You're quite happy with this, as that was rather painful. Suddenly, you go flying into the air. Rikku's foot mostly blocks your view, but streams of light manage to work their way around and into your view, and you realize she's taking the sock off. Her foot pulls away, and you're left in the sock with a view of Rikku's massive face, her hands keeping the sock rolled up around you.

"Is... is that what I think it is?" She asks. "What do you think it is?" You respond. She gasps. "You... You can talk?" You begin to get a bit annoyed with this sort of patronization. "Well what do you think I just did?" You ask.
114311.title: She takes you out of her sock...

choices: Saya. {Super Robot Tiasen OG Saga Endless Frontier.}

choices: Tali from the mass effect series

115331.title: Tali from the mass effect series

122.content: You walked into the lopez house to see max but he and George was gone for the week. When you walk into the living room you suddenly shrink too 2 inch. Suddenly you hear loud footsteps who is it.
122.title: George Lopez show

choices: Star vs the Forces of Evil...or SVTFOE for short

12423.title: Recent disney shows?

Is it you
Or
one of the characters from the show who shrinks
124231.title: Gravity Fall pov select

124233.content: who are you Steven or yourself
124233.title: nope, next.

1242331.content:
you wake up your door is a portal obviously you enter as you zoom across dimension doing backflips you can lean left or right'

on right : the gem temple

on left : The barn
1242331.title: yourself

12423311.content:
Falling onto a hay bale you quickly realize that you are in some sort of barn by the shape and color of the building.the barn was decorated in gigantic weird structures and machines.suddenly the ground begins to shack as two gigantic women appear one is a short green girl with a triangular hairstyle.the other girl is a tall lanky blue skinned girl.tge stand in the center of the room and begin to talk

"Lazuli the abnormallys are increasing in rarity what do you think it means?"the green girl asked lazuli "I don't know. Paradot look I'm going to get some sleep you can do what ever you like night"lazuli said waving goodbye making her way up stairs

Wondering where you were you decide the best course of action is to get the attention of one of these girls paradot is downstairs sitting looking at a chalkboard with pictures and numbers on it to far away to see clearly.lazuli looks to be faking sleep lying in bed kicking her feet humming.climbing down of the hay bale you decide to go towards
12423311.title: left (barn)

choices: Turn around and grab onto something on her body
124233112.content:
Thinking parador might have a sears you begin the journey across the wooden planks to her location.arriving at her feet you are able to get a better look at her she's a short girl with green skin some sort of visor around her eyes wearing a tight jumpsuit and big yellow triangular hair.she sitting cross legged on a chair thinking about something.jumping onto her foot you decide to climb up to her hair to get her attention.

Climbing up her leg you continue on ward up her side as you struggle to stay on her body due to her short statue you arrive at her shoulder.paradot waving her hand to cool herself off "jeez it's hot tonight.taking her fingers and airing out her jumpsuit by opening and closing it.the sudden movements of her movements make you fall down towards the open gap in her jumpsuit.

You can either grap toward her jumpsuit edge around her neck or turn your body and grasp the first thing you see to avoid falling all the way down
124233112.title: Paradot you continue

info.brief_description: You shrink around your favorite VG or TV characters
info.description: I know there are many of these but I created a new one because the others are rarely added to any more. There is a 100 GP reward and are no limits except no male giants and no deaths. Anything else is for you to decide. Thank you and good luck.
info.pretty_title: Video game/TV and Cartoon show shrink
